name: Sweet Potatoes
steps: ½ cup sugar ½ cup packed brown sugar
Scrub and peel sweet potatoes; cut into cubes. Boil 25-­‐35 minutes until tender. Combine
potatoes, sugar, milk, eggs, butter, and vanilla. Stir to break up potatoes. Put in baking dish.
Combine brown sugar, flour, and butter. Stir in pecans. Sprinkle on potatoes.
